meanings.definition: To form a cartel or join a cartel.
meanings.sent1: The group cartelizes to control the market.
meanings.sent2: The companies cartelizes to fix prices.
meanings.sent3: The animals cartelizes to share food in the forest.
meanings.sent4: The students cartelizes to dominate the playground.
meanings.sent5: The team cartelizes to win every game.

meanings.definition: To organize or operate as a cartel.
meanings.sent1: The drug dealers cartelizes to increase profits.
meanings.sent2: The oil companies cartelizes to limit competition.
meanings.sent3: The pirates cartelizes to divide the treasure fairly.
meanings.sent4: The politicians cartelizes to gain more power.
meanings.sent5: The mafia cartelizes to expand their influence.
